name: Epinephrine 1:10000
interactions: Do not mix with sodium bicarbonate as this inactivates epinephrine.

pedi: [PC1] [PC2] [PC7] 0.01mg/kg max single dose 1mg {IV/IO} repeat every 3-5 minutes
[PC1] [PC2] [PC7] 0.1mg/kg max single dose 2.5mg {ETT} repeat every 3-5 minutes

pearls: In shock situations, assessment of volume status and volume administration should precede epinephrine administration
Epinephrine causes a dramatic increase in myocardial oxygen demand and its use in the setting of an acute MI should be restricted to cardiac arrest.
